text:
<https://i.imgur.com/YFMGxxy.jpg>
I want to submit my work for the certification, but when i click on browse button then it redirect to the my system file manager, and for Add link field which link i need to add publish page or template link.
*Thank you*

It’s telling you not to use the file uploader.

As for the link, link to the finished page as it notes above.
The fields that are displayed there we don’t have an easy way to change per practicum that’s why it shows the upload field.

<@U01H7F1CBME>  are you just looking to add a new author? You can do that directly from the bog dashboard. The left hand side you will see an authors tab. Click that and you can add new authors and create bios etc

Anyone know why the Contact property `hs_analytics_last_url`  (<https://app.HubSpot.com/contacts/230056/settings/property/hs_analytics_last_url/|Last Page Seen>) is NOT available in the webhook subscriptions when setting up a custom app. However, it is provided by the <https://zapier.com/apps/HubSpot/integrations|Zapier App / Integration>? Assuming they built this app with the same access we all have… this should be available, No? I’m able to manually set this as the property value in the webhook sub, but not sure if it’s going to work unless its in the list of supported properties.
Hello <@U7SL518D6> thanks a lot for your support
